name: Balance
author: Zerahan
title: Balance Mod
description:
Quality of life improvements:
	- 200% solar panel and accumulator cost and output.
	- 150% robot speed.
	- 200% personal roboport charge speed (same energy usage).
	- Cannot right-click robots out of the air.
	- Shotguns requires 6 wood instead of 5, eliminating the odd wood count.
	- Longer underground belts and pipes.
